item.title: Backing up and Restoring Mongo DB
item.description:
Mongo DB is a type NoSQL database which treats your data like JSON- documents (key-value pair). In this post, I will be showing some steps in backin g up and restoring a Mongo DB.

We will use Mongo DB's built-in utility to backup and restore data.

Features

item.dc:creator: Ian Panganiban

item.title: Backup and Restore with PostgreSQL
item.description: PostgreSQL is a very powerful SQL database. It provides various fields in storing different data types like date, json, text, a rrays, etc. It also contains some backup and restore mechanism which you can use to safeguard your data. item.title: Backing up and restoring Elasticsearch data with Elasticdump
item.description:
Elasticsearch is a type NoSQL database which allows you to store unstructured data. It is highly performant and scalable. It allows you to implement full text searches and aggregations. This is very useful when dealing with large amounts of data.

Elasticdump is a NodeJS based package. This allows you to …
item.dc:creator: Ian Panganiban
